frontmatter.title: Nutshell
frontmatter.description: This piece shows Rosalind Franklin, English chemist and X-ray crystallographer whose work was central to the understanding of the molecular structures of DNA, RNA and viruses.

frontmatter.title: The Shadow of the Earth
frontmatter.description: This piece shows Suzanne Césaire. French writer, teacher, theorist, anti-colonial, and an active feminist. She is the creator of the Afro-Surrealism and co-founder of the journal Tropiques.
